actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Referring the bill (H.R. 2124), entitled "A bill for the relief of Adela and Darryl Bailor", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers a pending private bill for the relief of Adela and Darryl Bailor to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for preparation of a report to the House of Representatives that provides: (1) findings of fact and conclusions of law on the nature, extent, and character of the claim for compensation referred to in the pending bill as a legal or equitable claim against the United States; and (2) the amount, if any, that is legally or equitably due from the United States to Adela and Darryl Bailor.

titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 2124), entitled "A bill for the relief of Adela and Darryl Bailor", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
